items.label: Spooder Man
items.content:
The Amazing Spooderman

Personal information:
- Name: Peter Parker
- Age: 18
- Occupation: Student / Superhero
- Background:
  - Bitten by a radioactive spider and gained some powers
  - Balances school with fighting crime
- Personality:
  - Witty and humorous
  - Responsible and caring
- Appearance:
  - Slim build, athletic
  - Wears a red and blue spider-themed suit

Abilities:
- Wall-crawling
- Super strength and agility
...

items.label: The Incredible Bulk
items.content:
The Incredible Bulk

Personal information:
- Name: Bruce Banner
- Age: 40
- Occupation: Scientist / Superhero
- Background:
  - Exposed to gamma radiation during an experiment gone wrong
  - Transforms into the Hulk when angry or stressed
- Personality:
  - Intelligent and reserved as Banner
  - Aggressive and powerful as the Bulk
- Appearance:
  - Tall, muscular build
  - Green skin and massive physique as the Bulk

Abilities:
- Superhuman strength and durability
- Rapid healing factor
...

items.label: Floating Isles of Veyra
items.content:
Floating Isles of Veyra

Description:
- A chain of levitating islands connected by vine bridges
- Constant gentle winds and glowing crystals underneath

Key features:
- Central crystal spire used for navigation
- Home to sky nomads and wind mages
- Dangerous storm season every 7 years

Inhabitants:
- Mostly avian folk and cloud drakes
- Small human settlements on the lower isles
...

items.label: The Sunken City of Thaloryn
items.content:
The Sunken City of Thaloryn

Description:
- Submerged metropolis preserved by magic
- Visible from the surface during calm weather

Key features:
- Giant coral-encrusted towers
- Bioluminescent streets still faintly glowing
- Temple of the Deep with sealed vault

Dangers:
- Pressure traps and collapsing structures
- Guardian leviathans
- Cursed water that causes memory loss
...

items.label: Starshard Dagger
items.content:
The Starshard Dagger

Type: Magical weapon
Material: Meteorite obsidian + star-forged silver

Properties:
- Cuts through magical barriers
- Glows faintly near celestial magic
- Leaves trails of starlight when swung

Drawbacks:
- Slowly drains user's life force with prolonged use
- Attracts void creatures when used at night
...

items.label: Amulet of Whispered Truths
items.content:
Amulet of Whispered Truths

Cursed jewelry

Type: Necklace
Material: Black opal on mithril chain

Properties:
- Reveals hidden lies when worn
- Allows hearing thoughts within 5 meters (uncontrolled)

Curse:
- Wearer gradually loses ability to speak truth
- Voices become louder and more tormenting over time
...

items.label: The Shattering – Year 0
items.content:
The Shattering – Year 0

The cataclysm that broke the continent

Details:
- The Prime Spire was destroyed during the final battle of the God-Wars
- Massive magical backlash fractured the landmass into seven pieces
- Magic became unstable for the next three centuries

Consequences:
- Rise of isolated kingdoms
- Loss of ancient knowledge
- Appearance of the first rifts to the Void
...

items.label: The Iron Dominion – Year 347
items.content:
The Iron Dominion – Year 347

The rise and fall of the machine empire

Details:
- Inventors harnessed steam and rune-tech to unify the western lands
- Built colossal automatons and iron cities
- Collapsed after the Great Overload – machines turned against creators

Legacy:
- Scattered ruins filled with dangerous constructs
- Surviving blueprints still sought by tinkerers
- Cultural fear of unchecked invention
...
